data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 17576, Version Hash d68f92d7da04ff99
data.actual_result: All the channels except the one that has the default welcome messages enabled are unread.
data.expected_result: All channels should be marked unread.
data.short_description: When you join a server (that has the deafault welcome messages enabled) through an invite created from a channel other than that of the welcome message channel, the welcome message channel is marked read.
data.steps_to_repro: - Ask someone to create an invite link for a server that has the default welcome messages enabled (make sure that they create the invite for a channel other than the channel that has the messages enabled). - Join the server. - Observe the channel list.
